error.description: Error message if the migration failed

id.description: Timestamp when the table was created (ISO 8601)

schema.description: JSON Schema definition of the table

tableId.description: Identifier of the newly created table

array_contains.description: Filter on arrays: target JSON array must contain *all* of these values

array_ends_with.description: JSON value that the target JSON array must end with (could be object, array, primitive)

array_starts_with.description: JSON value that the target JSON array must start with (could be object, array, primitive)

gt.description: Greater-than comparison. Must be a number or numeric JSON value

gte.description: Greater-than-or-equal comparison. Must be a number or numeric JSON value

lt.description: Less-than comparison. Must be a number or numeric JSON value

lte.description: Less-than-or-equal comparison. Must be a number or numeric JSON value

mode.description: Case sensitivity mode for string filters within JSON ("insensitive" uses ILIKE on PostgreSQL)

path.description: Path in JSON (PostgreSQL: array of keys/indexes, e.g. ["pet1","petName"] or dot notation "pet1.petName")

search.description: Full-text search string for JSON content

searchIn.description: Scope of search within JSON structure

searchLanguage.description: Language for full-text search. Default: simple

searchType.description: Search type: plain (individual words) or phrase (exact phrase)

string_contains.description: Substring match in JSON string value

string_ends_with.description: Suffix match in JSON string value

string_starts_with.description: Prefix match in JSON string value

op.description: The operation to perform. Currently only "replace" is supported

path.description: JSON path using dot notation for objects and [index] for arrays. Examples: "name", "user.email", "items[0]", "data.list[2].value"

value.description: The value to set at the specified path. Can be any valid JSON value (string, number, boolean, object, array, or null)

id.description: Timestamp when the table was removed (ISO 8601)
Timestamp when the table was renamed (ISO 8601)
Timestamp when the update was applied (ISO 8601)

get.summary: Retrieve all related entities for a given endpoint

503.description: The Health Check is not successful
The Health Check is not successful
